block.p: In Provence, a good vintage can refer to wine, or it can refer to olive oil. Oliviers & Company specializes in all things olive oil, including salad bowls, metal flasks, bottles and a choice of 25 vintage oils produced all over the Mediterranean neighborhood, from Provence to Tuscany, Andalusia, Crete and Sicily.

In Provence, a good vintage can refer to wine, or it can refer to olive oil. Oliviers & Company specializes in all things olive oil, including salad bowls, metal flasks, bottles and a choice of 25 vintage oils produced all over the Mediterranean neighborhood, from Provence to Tuscany, Andalusia, Crete and Sicily.

The chain was begun in 1997 by Olivier Baussan, who created the cosmetics company L'Occitane. The ambience of the Oliviers boutique in L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue (exterior above and interior below) is mimicked throughout the chain, which now includes 20 shops in Europe and one in New York at Grand Central Terminal, across from Track 17. Oliviers & Company in New York: (212) 973-1472.
